column5: I have not been out as much as I would like to but I got out today despite the rain.  Ice thickness was great but I would have been better off with skates on.  I am very thankful for the recently purchased waterproof boots. No snow on the lake so it is like a rink out there. I only fished in the morning and only managed to land 2 fish.  Both were big lakers.  I marked tons of fish out there and they were very active.  I lost 4 other fish and one was big.  I also had about 3 more bites on top of that.  All lakers.  Fish were chasing like crazy today but they weren't commiting totally.  I bet I had over 25 chasers today.  The first pic of the laker is actually the big one of the day and it weighed in a hair under 10.5 pounds.  The second fish was smaller and thinner and I actually used the rod as a reference.  Nice fish and the rod is 28" long about the same as the fish.  You will have to forgive pic quality as I was by myself and the lens kept fogging up and I was in a hurry as I released both fish.  Pic quality is also crap because my camera takes bad pics (can't stand it. Olympus Stylus tough).  Whitey pics are from last week or the weekend before.  Can't remember.  Anyway my buddy and I got out and managed a couple of nice whiteys. Bigger Laker. A real football   Smaller laker   Whitey

And one more thing.  Be careful when parking if there is a slope. IT was slippery today I could actually move my car by pushing it when it stopped .  With all this snow we are getting right now, it will be glare ice covered by snow.  If you are coming up this way tomorrow (Sunday) take care and be cautious.
Some very nice fish there fella!!!
man, this fish makes me wanna fish again .. nice lookin fishies.. thnx for sharin
Nice catches Chris. Ya this snow will make a tricky walking out there.Cleats will be required forsure.  TFS
Great fish!!!, yep the snows covering a lot of stuff you would hate to run over with your car/truck out there.
Nicely done Chris That first laker had some girth to it    Congrats Thanks for sharing Jacques
Wow makes me wanna go out for some action now.   CP
Great work.  I was out both days this past weekend and all I got was one hook up that I lost mid fight  Sure needed waterproof boots
Good stuff. I saw the weather report and stayed home lol. Looks like I missed out, those are some nice fish
Looks like a great time....nice fish!!
